original_text: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those that were numbered of them, thirty and two thousand and five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families.
korean_text: 이는 에브라임 자손의 종족들이니 계수된 자가 삼만 이천오백 명이라 이상은 그 종족을 따른 요셉 자손이었더라

sentences.original_text: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim
according to those that were numbered of them
thirty and two thousand and five hundred
These are the sons of Joseph
